General.Name: The Israel Land Development Company Ltd
General.Description: Israel Land Development Alpha Ltd does not have significant operations. Previously, the company was involved in the oil and gas exploration business. Israel Land Development Alpha Ltd was formerly known as Hachsharat Hayishuv Energy Ltd. and changed its name to Israel Land Development Alpha Ltd in April 2010. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Bnei Brak, Israel. Israel Land Development Alpha Ltd is a subsidiary of The Israel land Development Company Ltd.
